pages.text: Mata kare wa, chijo ni yamayama o kengo ni sue rareta. (Soreha) daichi ga anata gata o yuriugokasanai tamedearu. Mata kawa ya michi o tsukura reta. Anata gata ga michibika reru tamedearu
Mata iroirona hyoshiki, hoshi o tayori ni kare-ra (hitobito) wa michibika reru
Kore demo sozo nasa reta kata ga, sozo shinai mono to kurabe rareyou ka. Soredemo anata gata wa, nao kunkai o ukeirenai no ka
Anata gata wa, tatoe arra no onkei o kazoete mo, totei kazoe tsukusu koto wa dekinai. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru
Arra wa anata gata ga kakusu koto mo, gen wasu koto mo shitte ora reru
Kare-ra (fushin-sha) ga, arra o sashioite, inori motomeru mono-tachi wa, nani mo sozo shinai. Shikamo kare-ra (jashin) jishin koso tsukura reta monodearu
(Kare-ra wa) shinda monode seimei wanai. Nanji yomigae sa reru kamo shiranai
Anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami (arra)dearu. Daga raise o shinjinai mono wa, sono kokoro kara shite shirou to sezu, kare-ra wa komandearu
Utagai mo naku, arra wa kare-ra no kakusu koto to, gen wasu koto o shitte ora reru. Kare wa koman'na mono o o konomi ni nara renai
Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no omo ga (muhanmado ni) kudasa reta no wa nani ka.' To towa reru toki, kare-ra wa,`mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu
Kare-ra wa fukkatsu no hi ni, jibunjishin'no omoni no zenbu to, chishiki ga nai tame ni, kare-ra ni mayowa se rareta mono no omoni o mo ou. A, kare-ra ga ou mono koso awaredearu

Kare-ra izen no mono mo (omo no michi ni taishite iroiro to) sakubo shita. Daga arra wa kare-ra no kozo-mono o, dodai kara kutsugaesa re, yane ga ue kara ochi, chobatsu wa yoso shinakatta homen kara kare-ra ni kudatta
